chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

d: dstatelet

Goal:
cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]

dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
cohMT = eq^~ empty_dstatelet : dstatelet -> Prop

dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
dom0 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V), dom Unit = [::]
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
dom_umfilt : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (p : pred K) (f : U), dom (um_filter p f) =i [predI p & dom f]
domUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), dom (f1 \+ f2) =i [pred x | valid (f1 \+ f2) & (x \in dom f1) || (x \in dom f2)]
domPtUnO : forall (A : Type) (h : heap) (x : ptr) (v : A) (f : partition (x :-> v) h), dom f =i [pred y | valid f & (x == y) || (y \in dom h)]

map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
domPtUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), dom (pts k v \+ f) =i [pred x | valid (pts k v \+ f) & (k == x) || (x \in dom f)]
domUnPt : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), dom (f \+ pts k v) =i [pred x | valid (f \+ pts k v) & (k == x) || (x \in dom f)]

Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
filter = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix filter (s : seq T) : seq T := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => if a x then x :: filter s' else filter s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> seq T Arguments filter {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
domPt : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V), dom (pts k v) =i [pred x | cond U k & k == x]

max_key_last : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
keys_last_mono : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) (k : K), path oleq k (dom f1) -> path oleq k (dom f2) -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \in dom f2) -> oleq (last k (dom f1)) (last k (dom f2))

dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Inductive finfun_on (aT : fintype.Finite.type) (rT : fintype.Finite.sort aT -> Type) : seq (fintype.Finite.sort aT) -> Type := finfun_nil : finfun.finfun_on rT [::] | finfun_cons : forall (x : fintype.Finite.sort aT) (s : seq (fintype.Finite.sort aT)), rT x -> finfun.finfun_on rT s -> finfun.finfun_on rT (x :: s) Arguments finfun.finfun_on [aT] _%function_scope _%seq_scope Arguments finfun.finfun_nil [aT] _%function_scope Arguments finfun.finfun_cons [aT] [rT]%function_scope [x] [s]%seq_scope
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
valid_mt_state = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM [ordType of nid] heap))) is_true_true : valid (dstate empty_dstatelet)
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
path = fun (T : Type) (e : rel T) => fix path (x : T) (p : seq T) {struct p} : bool := match p with | [::] => true | y :: p' => e x y && path y p' end : forall T : Type, rel T -> T -> seq T -> bool Arguments path {T}%type_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
